treebo - Regional Quality Controller

Location - Remote, Work Type: Full Time

Other August 01, 2022

For the uninitiated, Treebo is a new age hotel brand offering comfortable stays at budget prices. Staying at budget hotels has always meant making compromises on quality. Well, not anymore. At Treebo, we are putting dignity back into budget travel with our unmatched 100% Quality Guarantee. Founded in 2015, we currently operate more than 400 properties across 80 locations in India. We are hell bent on changing the way customer experience is delivered in the industry. So if you are passionate about being part of a truly game-changing team, look no more. This might just be the perfect opportunity for you!!

About the role:

The Regional Quality Controller (RQC) shall be the custodian of the brand-compliance and guest experience in their respective regions. The candidates shall be responsible:

  • Scrutinizing the audits conducted by the regional operations team to ensure highest standards of quality checks
  • Problem solving on improving guest experience by fixing recurring issues at the property
  • Act as a subject matter expert in the regional team on delivering great guest experience and train / coach the regional operations team as and when required
  • Represent the Treebo Quality Team in front of the hotel partners to drive adherence of the highest degree of compliance to the Treebo standards
  • Champion all Central Quality and Business initiatives in the region among the hotel partners and operations team

    • Requirements:

    • At least 5 yrs of experience working with a 5-star hotel chain as a Duty Manager / HK Supervisor
    • Strong understanding of basic concepts and departments of hospitality like FO, HK, Revenue Management, etc.
    • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills - the ability and confidence to have difficult conversations with utmost ease
    • Gold standard value system - someone who can uphold the highest degree of ethics and values
    • Willingness to travel extensively within the region
    Apply
